Summary

Biography

BREAKDOWN: Freshman Bronny James is a 6-4, 210-pound combo guard with elite basketball instincts and toughness with the ability to score from anywhere on the court.

HIGH SCHOOL: James is a 2023 graduate and honor roll student from Sierra Canyon High in Chatsworth, Calif. where he averaged 13.8 points, 5.5 rebounds, 2.7 assists and 1.8 steals as a senior. He was ranked as the No. 19 overall recruit in the 2023 recruiting class by ESPN.com. Sierra Canyon won the Mission League title in three of his four seasons on the team. He was named a 2023 McDonald’s All-American and scored 15 points on 5-for-8 shooting from three-point range with four assists in the McDonald’s All-American game. He was also selected to play for Team USA at the 2023 Nike Hoop Summit and had a key late rebound and pair of free throws to seal Team USA’s 90-84 victory…James scored 11 points, had four rebounds, an assist and a steal in the game. During the spring and summer between his junior and senior seasons, James averaged 11.5 points, 4.7 rebounds and 3.7 assists for the Strive For Greatness program on the Nike EYBL circuit.

PERSONAL: LeBron Raymone “Bronny” James was born on October 6, 2004 in Akron, Ohio…His parents are LeBron and Savannah James and he has two younger siblings, Bryce and Zhuri...In his spare time he is a gamer, likes to go snowboarding and play the piano and violin...His favorite musical artist is Juice WRLD...His favorite food is Acai Bowls....Someday would like to travel to Bora Bora...James is a Business Administration major at USC.

No stats available for the current season.
